page.title: 02Housing around Billingshurst
page.content: In this district house prices average{ {Â£32,000}for a first-time buyer's house (usually terraced or semi-detached with 2 or 3 bedroomns and a 'through-lounge/diner'). Detached houses with larger gardens (1/4 acre) average{Â£50,000+}and substantial country houses with 2 or 3 acres cost{ {Â£100,000+.}Most new houses fall into the 1st 2 categories. Estates of 15+ houses are common and new building is mainly limited to the village. There is a small stock of council houses for rent. Agricultural tied cottages are fewer, being sold off to tenants or other buyers. There is a small number of Edwardian and Victorian villas and cottages and a few thatched houses and ones with Horsham stone roofs. Homes are usually bought with{loans} from{building societies & banks}over 20 years or more.
